headline: SAG Awards: Hollywood Celebrities Go Maskless While LAUSD Students Still Forced to Mask Up
author: David Ng
sentences: Los Angeles County began relaxing its indoor mask mandate for businesses on Friday, allowing people to go maskless in restaurants, gyms, and other establishments only if they show proof of vaccination.

Hollywood celebrities went completely maskless for the SAG Awards on Sunday at the same time that thousands of children across Los Angeles County are still being forced to wear masks indoors in school.
The SAG Awards allowed the stars to forego masks despite previously announcing that masks would be required.
The change in policy appears to be in line with recent changes to local health guidance.

Comments:
The hypocrisy is everywhere, but this might be the most ridiculous.
These clowns are pretenders - that's what actors do for a living.
Couldn't they at least pretend to care?
